expected: <name>                    checks out a branch, if it exists; if the name refers to a report or a tag, detaches after checking out
-h, --help                shows this help message and exits
--detach [<name>]         detaches the HEAD; if a name is given, the referenced raport is checked out first
-b <name> [<start-point>] for non-existing branches, creates a branch and checks it out
--orphan <name>           creates and checks out an orphan branch
